name: Innovator Admin
tagline: A tool for querying and managing data, particularly data housed in Aras Innovator installations.
body:
# A Better Admin Tool

Innovator Admin is a Windows tool for querying and administrating databases.  It is the ideal tool for administrating [Aras Innovator PLM systems](www.aras.com) featuring an advanced AML query editor (with full intellisense) along with streamlined tools for exporting solutions from one database and importing them into another (e.g. during DEV to PROD migrations).  It is also quickly becoming a great tool for querying SQL Server databases (with intellisense for SQL queries) among other data sources.

# Download
If you don't want to build the project from the source code, you can download a [recent release](https://github.com/erdomke/InnovatorAdmin/releases/latest) from GitHub.

# Installation
If you run the setup.exe installer file, the program should install and update automatically.

# Contributing
All contributions are welcome.  The range from shout-outs on social media to [bug fix](https://github.com/erdomke/InnovatorAdmin/issues) submissions and [feature requests](https://github.com/erdomke/InnovatorAdmin/issues) to even feature additions submitted via a pull request.
